content.content: Hi, Short update from Data Insights: Both Vaults (MCD) and Governance trackers are transfered to new addresses beta.mcdstate.info is now available @ https://tracker-vaults.makerdao.network/ and beta.mcdgov.info @ https://tracker-gov.makerdao.network/ New tracker versions are speeded up and have some cool features, eg:  New charts on main page of MCD Vaults Tracker  Vaults end-of-the day snapshots history @ MCD Vaults Tracker  Protocol parameters full history @ Governance Tracker   We’re sorry if you had hard times finding our trackers  Any feed-back is appreciated as well as feature requests  You can reach us out on Discord #data-insights-public and here at the bottom of the page you’ll find more ways to get in touch with us
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
